<One Hundred Days in Palermo
1:
--------------------
Text: One Hundred Days in Palermo:  The film is a France/Italy coproduction and tells about the last hundred days in the life of the Italian "Generale dei Carabinieri" and anti-mafia highest authority Carlo Alberto Dalla Chiesa as prefect of Palermo, the capital of the Italian island of Sicily.
Triplets:<One Hundred Days in Palermo
2:
--------------------
Text: One Hundred Days in Palermo:  Dalla Chiesa's life ended with his barbaric murder, shot by the machine guns of a mafia squad (along his wife and his bodyguard) on September 3, 1982.
Triplets:<One Hundred Days in Palermo
